login.message: Facebook helps you connect and share with the people in your life.
login.createPage: Create a Page for a celebrity, brand or business.
login.emailinvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
login.passwordMin: Password shoul be at least 8 characters in length.
login.passwordMax: Password should not exceed 32 characters in length.

signup.firstnameMin: Your first name should have a minimum of 2 characters.
signup.firstnameMax: Your first name should not exceed 32 characters in length.
signup.firstnameInvalide: Please avoid using numbers and special characters.
signup.lastnameMin: Your last name should have a minimum of 2 characters.
signup.lastnameMax: Your last name should not exceed 32 characters in length.
signup.lastnameInvalide: Please avoid using numbers and special characters.
signup.emailRequire: You will need when you log in and if you ever need to reset your password.
signup.emailinvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
signup.passwordRequire: Enter a combination of at least six numbers, letters and punctuation marks  (such as ! and &).
signup.passwordMin: Password shoul be at least 6 characters in length.
signup.passwordMax: Password should not exceed 32 characters in length.
signup.dateError: It appears you've entered incorrect information. Please ensure you use your actual date of birth.
signup.genderError: Please choose your gender. You can change who can see this later.
signup.textContactInfo: <0>People who use our service may have uploaded your contact information to Facebook. <1>Learn more.</1></0>
signup.terms: <0>By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our <2>Terms</2>, <5>Privacy Policy</5> and <8>Cookies Policy</8>. You may receive SMS notifications from us and can opt out at any time.</0>

items.name: Campus
items.description: A unique, exclusive space for college students on Facebook.

items.name: Events
items.description: Organize or find events and other things to do online and nearby.

items.name: Find Friends
items.description: Search for friends or people you may know.

items.name: Groups
items.description: Connect with people who share your interests.

items.name: News Feed
items.description: See relevant posts from people and Pages you follow.

items.name: Pages
items.description: Discover and connect with businesses on Facebook.

items.name: Gaming Video
items.description: Watch and connect with your favorite games and streamers.

items.name: Play Games
items.description: Play your favorite games.

items.name: Video
items.description: A video destination personalized to your interests and connections.

items.name: Facebook Pay
items.description: A seamless, secure way to pay on the apps you already use.

items.name: Marketplace
items.description: Buy and sell in your community.

items.name: Recent Ad Activity
items.description: See all the ads you interacted with on Facebook.

items.name: Memories
items.description: Browse your old photos, videos and posts on Facebook.

items.name: Saved
items.description: Find posts, photos and videos that you saved for later.

items.name: Weather
items.description: Check your local forecast and sign up for daily weather notifications.

items.name: Ads
items.description: Create, manage and track the performance of your ads.

items.name: Jobs
items.description: Find a job that's right for you.

items.name: Climate science center
items.description: Learn about climate change and its effects.

items.name: COVID-19 Information Center
items.description: See the latest prevention tips, community resources and updates from health organizations.

items.name: Community Help
items.description: Get involved in your community by creating a drive, requesting or offering help or volunteering.

items.name: Fundraisers
items.description: Donate and raise money for nonprofits and personal causes.

items.name: Messenger
items.description: Chat instantly with your friends and connections.

items.name: Messenger Kids
items.description: Let kids message with close friends and family.

header.darkDec: Adjust the appearance of Facebook to reduce glare and give your eyes a break.
header.automaticDec: We'll automatically adjust the display based on your device's system settings.
header.compactDec: Make your font size smaller so more content can fit on the screen.
header.singleCharacterDec: Use single-character shortcuts to perform common actions.
header.previewsDec: Without opening a page to a person, event, or group, show info and actions in a preview window.
header.previewHovering: Show preview when hovering pointer over link
header.previewClickDec: Best when using a screen reader or magnifier. Links change to buttons that open preview windows.
